div.p: Adding a product to your shopping basket is probably the single most important thing that you can do on a retail website.
Using a screen reader on this well known UK brand website, that simply isn't possible.
When you go through the page there's no "add to basket" that's aknowledged by the screen reader.
Two pounds and twenty-four pence, list of one items.
Link three for 2 on selected dental, list end.
Collect eight points with this purchase.
One hundred, vertical bar, two pounds and twenty-four pence per one hundred.
In stock, Free collection in twenty-four hundred stores, delivery in four working days from two pounds and ninety five pence.
An accessibility audit from Nomensa would have picked up this error and given you a solution to rectify it...
...making sure that your website operates effectively for all of your customers.
